revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line
revision.text: ==Maltese== ===Etymology=== From dialectal {{inh|mt|ar|-}}, from {{der|mt|fa|شادی|tr=šâdi|t=[[monkey]]}}. Compare {{cog|arq|شادي|tr=šādi|t=[[monkey]]}} and {{cog|afb|شاذي|tr=šāḏi|t=[[monkey]]}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|mt|/ʃaˈdiːn/}} ===Noun=== {{mt-noun|g=m|p=xadini|f=xadina}} # [[monkey]], [[ape]] ====Usage notes==== * The feminine {{m|mt|xadina}} is often used as the default form of this word, so it need not necessarily imply a female animal. {{c|mt|Primates}}
